title: 6.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Insert a picture of a fruit you like from the stock images in a Microsoft Word document. Add the name of the fruit as the caption. Type a few lines about why you like the fruit. Format the text as shown in the picture and save it with the name Favorite fruit.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
